beacon.flask_app¶

Functions

handle()

Input: request.form Object Output: render_template(result.html, **locals()), takes string from home.html, uses VariantStringParser to convert the input string into Variant object and uses form database imported function “handle_variant” and uses from common function var_str to convert AnnotatedVariant to string

home()

Input: / Output: render_template(home.html) home with input field and submit button
